安娜·路易莎·阿兹维多 Ana Luiza Azevedo

director.name: 安娜·路易莎·阿兹维多 Ana Luiza Azevedo

introduction: Genre Documentary, FictionDirector Ana Luiza Azevedo, Jorge FurtadoCast Antonio Fagundes, Pedro Santos, Victor CastelYear 1988Length 12 minColor Color35mm gaugeCountry BrazilA frustrated man travels back in time in order to change the outcome of the soccer game that forever changed his life. A fantastic movie for those who likes soccer. This movie gives you an idea about the drama that all brazilians passed on 1950 world Cup, and especially the drama of Barbosa - the brazilian keeper on that cup. The defeat against Uruguay is in the mind of all brazilians until today.AwardsBest Editing in Gramado Festival 1988Best Fiction Film at the International Festival of Havana 1988FestivalsSundance Film Festival 1991
